epics.title: User Authentication and Security
epics.summary: Implement multi-factor authentication and ensure secure login.
epics.description: Build a secure authentication module with multi-factor authentication (MFA) to ensure that customers can securely log in to the portal. This module must adhere to the latest security standards to protect sensitive customer data and prevent unauthorized access.

epics.title: Personalized Dashboard
epics.summary: Create a user-specific dashboard displaying relevant banking products and services.
epics.description: Design and develop a personalized dashboard that displays available banking products and services based on customer profiles and eligibility. This dashboard should provide an intuitive and user-friendly overview of the customer's financial information and options.

epics.title: Responsive Design
epics.summary: Ensure the portal is responsive across various devices.
epics.description: Implement a responsive design that ensures the portal provides a consistent user experience across different devices, including desktops, tablets, and mobile phones. This includes optimizing layout, navigation, and functionality for each device type.

epics.title: Account Requests and Service Modifications
epics.summary: Enable submission of account opening requests and service modifications.
epics.description: Develop functionality for customers to submit account opening requests and service modifications through streamlined workflows that require minimal clicks. This feature should include form submission, status tracking, and real-time updates.

epics.title: Notifications and Updates
epics.summary: Implement real-time status updates and email notifications.
epics.description: Implement a notification system that provides real-time status updates and email notifications for customers regarding their submitted requests. This includes notifying users of any changes or required actions promptly.

epics.title: Interaction History
epics.summary: Maintain a comprehensive history of user interactions.
epics.description: Build a system to track and display a comprehensive history of all user interactions within the portal. This will allow customers to view past actions and submissions, ensuring they have full visibility of their interactions with the bank.

epics.title: Document Uploads and Saved Applications
epics.summary: Allow document uploads and the ability to save incomplete applications.
epics.description: Develop the capability for customers to upload necessary documentation directly through the portal interface and save incomplete applications. This will enable users to return and complete applications at their convenience.

epics.title: Integration with Core Banking System
epics.summary: Integrate the portal with the bank's existing core banking system.
epics.description: Ensure seamless integration of the portal with the bank's existing core banking system for optimal performance and reliability. This integration will allow real-time data synchronization and service execution.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.description: Implement role-based access controls to ensure that customers can only view and access services appropriate to their profile and authorization level. This will enhance security and ensure that sensitive data is only accessible to authorized users.
